name: Artime Group
description:
Artime Group is a full-service advertising and marketing partner that practices a synergistic approach to the agency/client relationship for the single purpose of consistently delivering measurable results.
We believe our success is founded on a simple principle: that the whole is greater than the sum of its parts. That when agency and client commit to a single goal, "client success," the work is consistently more on-target, more creative and more effective.
